import PaperPlane from "../../../svg/paperplane.svg" import InfoCircle from "../../../svg/info-circle.svg" import OverlayTrigger from "react-bootstrap/OverlayTrigger" import TextareaAutosize from "react-textarea-autosize" const CenterForm = ({ threads, selectedThread, formData, handleChangeForm, sendForm, command, handleChange, showTextField, textFieldValue, setTextFieldValue, sendCommands, deleteGeneration, regenerateGeneration, delilahWorking, }) => { const isFormSubmitted = threads.find((thread) => thread.id === selectedThread)?.generations.length > 0 const handleChangeTextField = (e) => { setTextFieldValue(e.target.value) } const formTypeTooltip = () => { return (

How to use Form Type

Brainstorm

Brainstorm is used to help you discover new things or more specific information about yourself.


Outline

Generates an outline of how your essay should be structured.


Introduction Paragraph

Generates an introduction paragraph for your essay.

) } const promptTooltip = () => { return (

How to fill Prompt

You can write your own prompt or use one of the prompts from the CommonApp application.


For example, "Some students have a background, identity, interest, or talent that is so meaningful they believe their application would be incomplete without it. If this sounds like you, then please share your story."

) } const topicTooltip = () => { return (

How to fill Topic

Find the topic of your essay. It can be a person, place, thing, or idea. Please refrain from using common topics, such as a sport or activity you may have done.


For example, "Grilled cheese sandwiches are the best," "My window," "Lunar New Year celebration with family," or "My favorite thing is my phone."

) } const experiencesTooltip = () => { return (

How to fill Experiences

Experiences are the characteristics of yourself. It can things like cultural identity, key moments you've had in life, or things you've done. YOU MUST BE SPECIFIC AND STRANGE WITH YOUR EXPERIENCES.


For example, "I am the son of a Vietnamese refugee, and was raised in the back of my mother's kitchen."

) } const commandsTooltip = () => { return (

How to use Commands

General

General is flexible. Share anything.


For example, "I want to change the topic to 'grilled cheese sandwiches'." or "Consider the following details about me: I have travelled across the world."


Show Don't Tell

You can use Show Don't Tell to generate a paragraph that shows your personality, rather than telling it.


For example, "I am Asian."


) } const sendFormComponent = () => { return (
{ e.preventDefault() sendForm() }} className='rounded-2xl mb-8 bg-white mx-4 absolute mx-auto left-0 right-0 bottom-0' > {/* Center Form*/}
{/* Form Type Column Field */}
{/* Form Text Column Fields */}
{formData.prompt_choices.map((promptChoice, index) => (
handleChangeForm(e, index)} placeholder={promptChoice.placeholder} maxRows={3} >
))}
{/* Paperplane Container */}
) } const sendCommandsComponent = () => { return (
{ sendCommands(e, command, textFieldValue) }} className='rounded-2xl mb-8 bg-white w-5/6 absolute mx-auto left-0 right-0 bottom-0' >
{/* Delete and Regenerate Row */}
{/* Center Form */}
{/* Command Select Column Field */}
{/* Text Field Column */}
{showTextField && (
)}
{/* Form Text Input Field */}
) } return ( // <>{!isFormSubmitted ? sendFormComponent() : sendCommandsComponent()} // ) } export default CenterForm
